com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row

Class ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation<T,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.RowWiseDataTableTransformation
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>
        • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation<T,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type the transformation acts on. This will often correspond to the transformed column's data type.
    C - The typ of the context.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataTableTransformation, MutatingDataTableTransformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FunctionRowWiseColumnTransformation

    public abstract class ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation<T,C>
extends ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>
    The ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation is a row-wise contextual data table transformation which transforms a single column in the table.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation(java.lang.String column)
      Constructor specifying the column in the data table which will be transformed.
      protected ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation(java.lang.String column, DataType dataType)
      Constructor specifying the name of the column in the data table which will be transformed, and the type the transformation acts on.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected T getColumnData(DataRow row)
      Get the data from a data row for the column this transformation acts on.
      protected abstract T getTransformedData(T t, ContextDataRow<C> contextDataRow)
      Get the transformed cell data, given its initial value and context data row.
      protected void transformRow(ContextDataRow<C> contextDataRow, DataTable table, int rowIndex)
      Transform a given row of data in the table.

      • Methods inherited from class com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.ContextualRowWiseTransformation

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation

        protected ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation(java.lang.String column,
                                     DataType dataType)
        Constructor specifying the name of the column in the data table which will be transformed, and the type the transformation acts on.
        Parameters:
        column - The name of the column this transformation will act on.
        dataType - The type the transformation acts on. If this does not correspond to the type of data held by column, the the data table will probably need to have data coercion enabled.

      • ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation

        protected ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation(java.lang.String column)
        Constructor specifying the column in the data table which will be transformed. The data type this transformation acts on will be the same as the type of the column in the data table.
        Parameters:
        column - The name of the column this transformation will act on.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransformedData

        protected abstract T getTransformedData(T t,
                   ContextDataRow<C> contextDataRow)
        Get the transformed cell data, given its initial value and context data row.
        Parameters:
        t - The initial value of the cell.
        contextDataRow - The context data row holding both the context and the data of the row which will be transformed.
        Returns:
        the value to set the cell to.

      • transformRow

        protected void transformRow(ContextDataRow<C> contextDataRow,
                DataTable table,
                int rowIndex)
        Description copied from class: ContextualRowWiseTransformation
        Transform a given row of data in the table. The actual transformation should be performed on the table (at the specified row index), and not on the data row, which may be unmodifiable or separated view of the data. On the other hand, access of the row's data (and context) for use in the transformation should occur through the data row parameter.
        Specified by:
        transformRow in class ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>
        Parameters:
        contextDataRow - The ContextDataRow representation of the row to transform. This object will hold the context which may be used in the transformation.
        table - The table holding the row to transform.
        rowIndex - The index (in table of the row to transform.

      • getColumnData

        protected T getColumnData(DataRow row)
        Get the data from a data row for the column this transformation acts on.
        Parameters:
        row - The row holding the data which will be transformed.
        Returns:
        the value from row of the column this transformation acts on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row does not have a column which matches to the one this transformation acts on.
